topComments.author: Fire Bride
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amo esse parque!! √ìtimo lugar para todas as suas aventuras ao ar livre. Os pavilh√µes s√£o espa√ßosos, limpos e muito bem conservados. J√° para n√£o falar das vistas deslumbrantes sobre a √°gua... o meu novo local favorito!!! E √© aberto ao p√∫blico aos domingos... tem que adorar!!  (Original) Love this park!! topComments.author: Hannah Abreu
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um √≥timo lugar para vir com a fam√≠lia. Eu realmente gostei e foi bom que eles forneceram cheques de chuva para o meu grupo desde que come√ßou a chover depois de uma hora da nossa chegada. Minha √∫nica reclama√ß√£o √© que, quando finalmente voltamos, verifiquei o site e disse que estava aberto das 8h √†s 19h. Chegamos por volta das 16h15 e eles nos informaram que o parque fecharia em uma hora, ent√£o eu realmente n√£o consegui aproveitar a experi√™ncia, mas pelo menos as crian√ßas tiveram uma boa hora üòù  (Original) This is a great place to come with the family. I really enjoyed it and it was nice that they provided rain checks for my group since it started raining after an hour of our arrival. My only complain is that, when we finally got to come back I checked the website and it said it was open from 8am to 7pm. We arrived around 4:15pm and they inform us the park was going to close within an hour, so I didn't really got to enjoy the experience, but at least the kids had a nice hour üòù

N√£o pense que eles t√™m uma lavanderia no local. Sendo t√£o grande, pensei que seria tranquilo √† noite, no entanto, voc√™ podia ouvir os carros correndo para cima e para baixo na Pines Blvd, sendo o bairro as festas do parque at√© o √∫ltimo minuto do hor√°rio da ordenan√ßa de ru√≠do. The playgrounds are nice and clean for the kids  2. Safety town as most of them at other parks need some TLC but in general is a good pretend play area.  3. The RV campground is okay. Shaded spots are hit and miss. Don't think they have a laundry on site. Being so big i thought it would be quiet at night however, you could hear the cars racing up and down pines blvd, the neighborhood being the park parties until last minute of noise ordinance time. (Original) We went to the water park. The pipeline is closed. But the kids had fun in the other parts of the water park. We went early so we were able to get some shade, but this is very hard to achieve if you are not an early bird. A very good activity for the summer. And the prices are reasonable.

Parece um lugar divertido para fam√≠lias com crian√ßas.  (Original) Looks like a fun and well kept park. topComments.author: Gabby Leon
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Paradise Cove n√£o parece nada do que costumava ser. Durante a pandemia, eles n√£o devem ter feito nenhuma manuten√ß√£o no parque porque todo o parque est√° sujo e a √°gua est√° cheia de folhas e galhos e a pintura est√° desbotada nas atra√ß√µes. Os grandes escorregadores e a √°rea infantil est√£o fechados para que todos estejam condensados ‚Äã‚Äãem uma √°rea central de √°gua. During the pandemic they must‚Äôve not done any maintenance on the park because the entire park is dirty & the water is full of leaves & sticks & the paint is faded on the attractions. The big slides and kiddie area are closed so everybody is condensed into one center water area. The lazy river is half broken like the water sprinklers & is so packed because there‚Äôs nothing else to do. I believe the food area was closed as well. Significantly cheaper since they‚Äôre lowered their level of quality. They should just remodel the whole park. So sad because this used to be a great water park for locals.

topComments.author: Samantha Ward
topComments.comment: Its only 7 to get on yall per person after 3 its even cheaper. They have any area to eat as well, but I brought my own food and had no problems. Its great for the kids and they have a lazy river for the kids and children can sit on adults laps. I highly recommend coming here it's supposed to be looking for a place to let the kids run around and be free for a few hours this place was perfect
